name: ZeroChance
description:
Story:
As an important and talented knight of a secret organization, they send us to the village of Wisp because of the rumor of the resurrection of the "demon lord". But when we reach the village, we see that things go beyond rumors. Our next goal is not to examine the rumor. Trying to prevent the devil lord's resurrection.

What's the purpose ?

We try to survive by killing the creatures we encounter in each level.
You need to earn money by killing creatures. When you reach enough money, you can buy new weapons from the market.
You can unlock 1 skill in every 5 levels. A boss awaits you at the end of each level.

There are 3 levels in the game.
All you have to do is complete the 3 levels, kill the last boss and complete the game.
The number of monsters increases with each level.



Features:
- Arena (Score Mode) (You have to finish the game to turn on this feature.)
- 6 Weapons 4 Shields
- 5 Skills
- You can level up to 25 levels.
